    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<GymOwner> getGymOwnerList()
      Makes an API call to the database to fetch the complete list of all GymOwners registered with GMS.
      java.util.List<GymOwner> getPendingGymOwnerList()
      Fetches a list of all gym owners from the db that have sent an approval request to the admin, i.e., their approval status is "Pending"
      boolean loginGymOwner​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Authenticates the user by fetching details from the db and logs in that user, if successful.
      void registerGymOwner​(GymOwner gymOwner)
      Registers a new gym owner with the GMS platform and adds the details to DB.
      void sendOwnerApprovalRequest​(java.lang.String gymOwnerId)
      A gym owner sends an approval request to the admin so that they get approved in order to list their gym centres with GMS
      void setGymOwnerList​(java.util.List<GymOwner> gymOwnerList)
      Sets the gymOwnerList with an existing list
      void setPendingGymOwnerList()
      Sets the list of pending gym owners.
      void validateGymOwner​(java.lang.String gymOwnerId, int isApproved)
      Admin calls this function to validate (approve/disapprove) a gymOwner

        Parameters:

        password - password of the user
        Returns:

      • registerGymOwner

        public void registerGymOwner​(GymOwner gymOwner)
        Registers a new gym owner with the GMS platform and adds the details to DB. Initially, this gym owner is not approved
        Specified by:
        registerGymOwner in interface GymOwnerInterfaceDAO
        Parameters:
        gymOwner - complete GymOwner object of a new gym owner

      • getPendingGymOwnerList

        public java.util.List<GymOwner> getPendingGymOwnerList()
        Fetches a list of all gym owners from the db that have sent an approval request to the admin, i.e., their approval status is "Pending"
        Specified by:
        getPendingGymOwnerList in interface GymOwnerInterfaceDAO
        Returns:
        list of GymOwner objects with approval status as Pending

        Specified by:
        sendOwnerApprovalRequest in interface GymOwnerInterfaceDAO
        Parameters:
        gymOwnerId - the id of the GymOwner who wants to send a req

      • validateGymOwner

        public void validateGymOwner​(java.lang.String gymOwnerId,
                             int isApproved)
        Admin calls this function to validate (approve/disapprove) a gymOwner
        Specified by:
        validateGymOwner in interface GymOwnerInterfaceDAO
        Parameters:
        gymOwnerId - the id of the GymOwner who is being validated
        isApproved - approval status, 0: Not Approved, 1: Approved, 2: Pending
